content.detailedDescription: I sat on my back porch to observe the stars as i often do when i noticed a craft fly quickly overhead. it was significant because it had no lights. the planes that regularly fly over have a red and green light on either wing.  no lights and it made no sound. i watched as it made a small change of direction and continued south by southeast.  the object was orangish and seemed to be lit on the inside. that was why i noticed it. it was lighter than the twighlight sky.  the fact that i heard no sound made me curious. it was sort or boomerang shape or more like the crescent of a bow before it is stretched out t fire an arrow.
content.summary: Airplanes fluy over my house regularly. this had no sound. went overhead, made small direction change. boomerang shape. had aura or 'energy field'

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down lonely st around 8:40 p.M on monday august 12 2013 with my husband. we were headed from barnes st down towards burholme st.  on my left, there were 4 people staring up to the sky.  i overheard the man mention a few things about aliens/ ufos.  when i looked up i noticed a object (around the size of a helicopter or plane in the distance) it was a pulsating fireball of multiple colors. i made the mistake of continuing to walk and look up at it.. before i knew it, it would disappear in the distance (ascending? but not straight up). it is hard to say how far it was from me but it gave off a very large glowing "flame."  it didn't make a sound. i'm curious if this was an ufo or maybe some flaming space treasures?
content.summary: Fireball object hovering in fox chase/ rockledge

content.detailedDescription: Talking to friend/neighbor outside her front porch. i was facing her, she was facing me (she was facing south). she said something like look at that, what are those...I turned and looked in the direction she was pointing. far up in the sky were two solid white cylindrical objects flying from south/southwest to northeast toward nellis afb(?).  no sound no wings.  black windows(?) on both objects.  thought they must have been planes, but no wings at all.  this is the 2nd sighting we have had together in 3 days.  wth is going on here in vegas?
content.summary: 2 solid white cyllindrical wingless objects in broad daylight, one following the other

content.detailedDescription: On the 12 of august at 11:25 pm me and my family waited out the back of the house scanning the skies for the meteor shower happening that night, and as i looked to the south east i looked at the horizon and saw what looked like a star but after a few seconds i could see it was getting closer. it flew in a direct flight path, and was golden in appearance and was pulsating brighter and brighter . this object was moving slowly enough that it lasted over 2 minutes . it was totally silent moving from se to sw. i could see also that as it passed over my house apart from the pulsating orb itself all around it the sky glowed to a certain extent . and as a ufo believer i couldn't take my eyes off it, it was as if i was glued to the ground i stood, the fact that we don't see a lot of ufo's or rarely here about them here in ireland it left me more bewildered gazing at it. it was quite a weird feeling after seeing it as it would have been very large if it wasn't as high up. i lost sight of the object then when i passed the horizon again. as it was my first sighting i now know to run and get a camera as it would of been able to be picked up on film . all i can say is i hope i get to see more.
content.summary: While waiting for the meteor shower i watched the skies with my family , on the horizon i saw a pulsating golden orb and it travelled slowely se to sw over my house and it moved to the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
While enjoying my daily bike ride i noticed what i first believed to be an airplane trail at an extremely high altitude. it was so high i thought to myself that it could not be a plane that had taken-off from tampa international airport. 

the trail began to fade when another, shorter trail appeared. the object appeared to glow or flash very brightly and then was no longer visible.
content.summary: Appeared egg shape but difficult to tell because of distance

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation, standing with my husband on the pier at fort myers beach, ft. myers florida. just taking photo's, and waiting for sunset to hopefully get a good sunset photo. i took several photo's of the setting sun over the water, beach, pier etc. did not notice anything out of the ordinary at the time, there was no sound, only the sounds of many people at the beach. 
only when i got home, and later on uploaded the photo's to my laptop, did i notice the "blob", and zoomed in to see it closer, thinking it was a bird or something. it looks like an orb with a solid shape, and does have that 'saturn like' shape that's mentioned here in the questions, but it's hard to tell as it's so far away and zooming in doesn't help. it appears to be tilted?
it appears to have a slight glow or "halo" effect, and possibly a little reflected light on one side from the sun's light? (this seen when zoomed in.)
i couldn't tell you if it was moving erratically or whatever as i didn't notice it at the time, i was focused on the sunset and getting a clear shot.
doesn't appear to me to be a helicopter, or bird, as you can see it's far away and if it's a bird it'd be a big one! don't think it's a bug either, as it'd be closer than this appears���.But i'll let you be the judge!
one other thing to mention was i put the photo temporarily into "neon" in picasa, and it shows the object as a white solid looking blob, with a black pinpoint center! i tried different effects to see if it showed the "blob" in a way that i hoped would make it easier to identify. other than the interesting neon effect, it didn't really help.
i'm enclosing the photo and a zoomed in cropped version so you may see it better, it's the blob to the right of the small cloud above and to the right of the sun.

i am interested to know if anyone else saw it, videotaped it or can explain it somehow, can you let me know? thank you in advance!
content.summary: Taking photo's of the sunset over ft. myers beach, did not notice the ufo (at the time) until after i looked at photo's on computer.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving for work at about 9:20pm and as i went outside i noticed a bright star in the sky. upon paying closer attention to it i realized that it was moving, travelling in a nne/ne direction. at first i thought it must have been a satellite or something, but then it started moving from side to side and i was pretty sure that this wasn't a satellite. i went inside to look for a camera but when i came back out with one, it apeared to be gone, however i saw a faint moving light very far away in the east direction.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star making erratic movements

content.detailedDescription: 2300hrs. reading newspaper on porch. facing appx east. looked to my right(appx south) saw orange object in sky above neighbor's house. nothing made me look in that direction.  i normally look at stars on clear nights. i have lived in my house 10 years. i have never seen anything like that in that sky positionbefore. my first impression was that is was a japanese lantern floating in the sky. not star. apparently not moving. not pulsating. got binoculars-bushnell 10x50. i sometimes stargaze. time from object to get binos-appx 8 sec. still in same position. turned off porch light. very little background light. no clouds. very few cars. not a reflection off something.  engaged binos.  object had outline cross between rectangular/oval. not distinct. color was bright orange-not orange-juice color,  but shiny orange like coals in a hot fire. it seemed to shimmer,  like heat from a jet engine. at arms length object was size of fingernail.  nothing to reference size/distance. while watching through bino, object "disappeared". no orange object in bino field where i was looking. engaged eyes to look at the area. object "reapppeared"(possibly turned on axis?) moving southwest at a steady rate. no green/red lights as on an airplane. no white landing lights. firmly believe not plane or helicopter. object moved appx 10 finger widths(at arms length) and disappeared over neighbor's house and out of my sight. it took appx 3 seconds for me to loose sight of it.  no noise-again not sure of distance. brought bino's down and looked in direction of where object disappeared.  thought "wow'. about to go inside house, looked up and object reappeared over neighbor's house(appx 3 seconds from last seeing it), object moved in straight line from southerly direction over my house on a north-northwest course.  again no noise of any kind.  stayed out and continued to look for appx 1/2 hour longer. nothing else. i served in the military--i am aware of the sights/sounds of planes and choppers. no sound of either. no wind. it was not the space station, meteor/shower,planet, or high-flying jet or satellite.  i have seen all those and know the difference.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: At arms length-the size of fingernail. solid bright orange-not glowing, like fire ember orange bright not emanating

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on my driveway loading my friends equipment into his car.
2. they were moving across the sky toward our direction and were an unusual color and size and flickering.
3. a plane.
4. they came in from the west. the first one coming in slower and more northerly in origin. they came in silently and then seemed to slow and then ascend into the clouds above. each time coming in from a more southern origin and going up a bit further north. the last ones came in quickly as if to "catch-up". 
they appeared to flicker and were an orange like glow. they had a dome or disk on top of the glowing sphere and the sphere appeared to be translucent. there appeared to be a static light emitting on to the surrounding clouds which i first thought was  "bugs or a bat" on my video screen. they appear to have a camera like structure or an eye like thing moving about inside.
5. i was excited and nervous afterward i was scared and actually spent the night at my partners home.
6. they all eventually disappeared into the clouds
content.summary: Yellow/orange glowing globes under a disk like hood silent traveling across sky and then ascending into clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
It was on the night of august 1, 2013. approximately 10:15 pm. i was accompanying my brother while he was taking his girlfriend home along with my friend, and cousin (walking). it was very dark out. i was starring into the night sky just like anybody else would. of course, at this time airplanes and helicopters were still flying around. 

then, out of no where i saw this 3 red-orange dots that to me looked like the size of a star because they were about 4.5-5 miles away at the most. i saw those three dots making the shape of a triangle. i could not see a craft because of how dark it was, but the dots were bright enough for me to know that it was a (triangle shape) ufo. i am sure that it was not a plane or a helicopter. it was flying at a pretty fast speed, then it made a full on "u" turn and went the other way. unfortunately for us, there was a tall tree nearby which prevented us from seeing where it went. i may not have the greatest sight, but i saw a ufo. but then again, if you don't believe me, ask my brother, he was also a witness. his girlfriend, nor my friend or cousin saw it. only my brother and i. i was shocked. we were shocked. for year and years i heard many people say they weren't real. that it was all fake. and i refused to believe. and now that i have witnessed it with my own eyes. it has inspired me to become a ufologist!
content.summary: They're here. and they're watching.

content.detailedDescription:
First, i am writing this narrative to find out if anyone else has ever had a similar experience.  i read a lot on-line... i listen to coast to coast... i have never heard anyone at anytime describe what my girlfriend and i saw/witnessed.  i would really appreciate an answer.  thank you.

my girlfriend/future wife/now ex and i were sitting on a patch of grass outside her place of employment one night while she was taking a break... it was an office complex on cole road in boise, idaho (nearest major intersection was cole and franklin).  it was, to the best of my recollection mid to late march, it may have been early april.  we were smoking cigarettes and sitting side by side.  we were facing east which in boise means we were looking toward the ridge of mountains that run roughly north and south along the east edge of the city.  the top of the ridge is approximately 3,500 feet above the city.  it was a beautiful, clear night, and fairly warm for that time of year.

as we were sitting there chatting we were both looking east, not facing each other, which means we both had the same field of view.  there was an obvious airliner flying south over (parallel with) the ridge overlooking boise.  i say it was an airliner because that was what it appeared to be... the right altitude, the right speed, it wasn't zigging or zagging, it was flashing an airliners anti-collision lights... etc.  neither of us commented on it because it was just an airliner but we were both watching it because it was the only thing moving in the sky and i suppose that was what drew our attention to it.  

suddenly, a flourescent green "diamond" shaped opening appeared directly in front of the "aircraft" (i would estimate that the distance between the aircraft and the window was about the width of my thumb at arms-length).  the "plane" flew into this "window" and disappeared.  it did not fly through it... it flew into it and disappeared and as soon as the "plane" disappeared the "window" did as well.

my girlfriend and i looked at each other and at the same time said, "did you see that!"  it was the weirdest thing that either of us had ever seen... 

to this day i know what we saw... i just don't have any idea what it was or could have been.  and i would love to know if anyone, anywhere, has ever seen anything like it or reported seeing anything like it. 

now... having finished my narrative you can see how your above checklists don't exactly allow me to "check the boxes".  let me again thank you for letting me put this out there for your review and i would very much like a response if time permits.
content.summary: What we thought was a plane flew into a flourescent green diamond-shaped window & then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
this was a chance sighting, i have a security camera scanning the sky and then i spotted all these objects in formation, i went outside and then i can see them with the naked eye, in formation brights, but not point like, with a bluish color bright, this was at 4:15pm today, not two hours ago, and the sun was glaring, difficult to distinguish lots of details when the sun is almost in front of your face, objects pass overhead coming from the northeast and moved in formation going southwest. you can see birds and planes below them, they "flew" a little over cloud level.

 i run inside and got my sony hd camcorder, but with the small viewfinder in this camcorder i just got a very short glimpse of these objects, at least can be seen in the sony footage and eleven on the security camera footage. that video is attached with this report.
content.summary: Eleven objects in formation, recorded with two cameras.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving and noticed up in the sky to my left approximately 8 bright orange round lights.  as i was driving they would be hidden behind trees but then come into view again.   i then noticed at least three cars pulled to the side of the road in various locations but close proximity, all of the occupants were also looking up in they sky.   i stopped and asked one of the occupants if they saw the lights, he commented yes i saw them as i was coming south on highway 280 and followed them to here.   he also stated they were bright orange, without my prompting him.   then the lights were gone.  

i told my brother about the sighting and he said they sounded like phoenix lights.  i then googled phoenix lights and the shape and color looked exactly like what i saw.   the difference was i saw more of them and they were hovering in a shape i did not see on the internet.
content.summary: Line of bright orange orbs in a curved line (up and down) curved to the right

content.detailedDescription:
Firstly may express that i believe i am talking to people who understand with belief about this message.  i do not believe i will be taken for a hoaxer, liar or thought to be crazy.  everything in this message, including attachments are real and true to the best of my knowledge.

attached is a short document describing my very close ufo encounters and abduction experiences, as i firmly believe i was abducted 3 times up until now.  i believe i was abducted the third time just 7 days ago where my mother was involved as an eyewitness.  i already reported this to mufon using the report form.  also, i had a number of alien encounters totaling 14 so far up until now.  every one of my alien encounters were a different type of alien, including different species of grey.  i have no idea why i had so many encounter experiences, as they were all very real where some cannot be explained not being real.

of all this all i got to show for it as proof is 7 small spots on my arm that form 5 perfect triangles, and my photos and film.  i do not know how i got the spots, as i discovered them one day in 2005 while sitting in my bed.  4 of the spots form a perfect cross.  my doctor said he never saw anything like it.  i would photograph my arm, but i have not had access to a camera over the years.

i photographed and filmed ufos in my area within a half mile from my home.  i already sent you my "real ufos" dvd that is an hour and 3 minutes long.  i filmed mostly from a cul-de-sac that is down my street.  i have not heard from you about it.  i filmed from 2004 to 2006, but not every night.

yesterday i saw a cable program describing things about space that was not ufo related, but i learned in relating my photos, film and personal experience that quantum mechanics and use of dimensions probably have something to do with ufos and how they travel.  this is probably nothing new to you being i understand that the government has loads of stuff like crashed ufos and bodies.

my abduction when i was 26 is unusual in relating it to most other abductions.  i do not know of any purpose for any of my abductions.

i hope i have been help, and i hope you enjoy reading my document.

thank you, and i hope to hear from you soon.

best,

thomas

p.S. i will research for a way to put my dvd in my computer.  if i can i will promptly send it to you.  the photos attached were derived from my dvd.
 










");
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,   Cone,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: A lifetime of paranormal experience

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at approx. 9pm sitting on the stoop with family and we noticed bright circular yellow/orange lights following each other in a line from the northwest to the southeast in the sky when the lights got to a certain part in the sky they began to appear smaller and smaller until they disappeared.
content.summary: Bright circular yellow/orange lights flying in straight path in sky then disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was in front of my house facing west. noticed unually bright white light from sw. it moved in the sky like a satilite but much brighter. as light passed over head. noticed a dim light trailing bright light. i too moved like a satillite with some separation but traveling at the same pace. as lights passed to ne neither dimmed like a satillite would. lost visual as they got lower to horizon. person conclusion: possibly space station but have never see station pass this high in sky for washington. have only seen it low in southern horizon.  side thought maybe chinese program?
content.summary: 2 lights, night sky.Lead light bright white, following light dim like satilite. same direction & speed

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back porch of my cottage on lake huron watching early persied meteor shower at about 11:40 pm, on 8/10/13. i saw a few satellites pass by also. then noticed what appeared to be a satellite except much brighter (like a star is bright)heading from north, to south, toward my location for about 8 seconds. i started watching it at about 65 degrees above me. at about 87 degrees above me, it hooked (close turn)an immediate left turn, and headed east over lake huron toward canada. about three seconds after it made the turn the brightness totally disappeared. it blinked right out. i have five telescopes, and am an amateur astronomer. i sky watch all the time. it had a brightness almost of venus, that's what caught my attention. so i knew it couldn't be a satellite. then came the abrupt left turn to head east. unless their was a collision up there, it could not have changed direction, and proceeded as though it was an intended maneuver. after it headed east, about four seconds later the light blinked right out. i might add it was moving faster than a satellite's steady pace.
content.summary: Bright glowing white object, changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
Location & time:
date:  12.08.2013
time: approximately 11:40 ��� 11:55
location of the object: southwest moving northwest moving straight over the city center of frankfurt germany.
location of sighting frankfurt germany, in the quarter  nordend.
altitude of the object: about that of an airplane (but i think it came down a little as it came toward us).

sighting:

i was in my office, which has a pretty nice view of the skyline (view from the south west) of frankfurt germany when i noticed something i thought was a balloon flying around about 1.5 miles away. it was moving rather strange and seems to reflect the sunlight. i asked a colleague to take a look and we agreed that it was a helium balloon sparkling in the sun and continued to work (it looked like it was rising up into the air and drifting away.

about 5 min later, whatever it was had come back down a little and was heading toward us (north east) i took another look at it, since it got a little closer. now i could see a little more detail and was sure that this was no balloon. i told another colleague to come over and take a look and we both stood there looking out the window, at this strange ���ufo���.

it was moving about the speed an airplane would move when it���s up in the sky. but this object was way lower and came closer and closer. at this point i got out my iphone 5 and did a short recording of the object, but i was a little exited and decided to quit the recording so i can see this thing with my own eyes. now the thing was coming pretty close to our left side. at this point it was about one inch big (for us since it was no way i can tell how big it was). it was approximately the size of a small airplane.  now i had about 10 sec to view this thing as it flew over our left side. now i was sure this was something really strange! this thing was a perfect star shape. metallic (aluminum type) color on the inner side, while there was a white outline on the edges. i got to see this object pass over my right side. that gave me the chance to see that it was not very thick. it was almost like one of those christmas stars you can nail to the wall (almost flat). from my distance i was about 1 ��� inched high and about ��� inch thick. what is even stranger is that this object was flying not like a plane or ordinary flying saucer horizontal. the star was quite flat from the side and was flying vertical!! basically with its flat side first! how is it even possible to even fly? it was moving straight, no wobbles like a balloon, no signs of propulsion (contrail) or smoke coming from the rear like a rocket or a plane.  sadly i had to let it pass over us to our left without running to the other side of the building since i was at work and i was already making quite a fuss. i asked my colleague twice, if what we both saw was a plane or a balloon because it was just so weird and he said it was no balloon or plane, but could be a experimental drone of some sort. i asked what type of star shaped drone could fly with its wide flat side first totally straight and vertical and he replied they are here (meaning the aliens with a funny look and grin).

other colleagues laughed at me for mentioning it so i kept quiet after telling them once what we have seen. unfortunately the video did not turn out that good since i recorded without zoom. but this object is visible flying in the sky. so at least i have a little proof.

anyway, the weird part is that i thought i saw a real balloon go up in the area where i had first seen this object (after my lunch break). but i didn���t have time to investigate any further. me my colleague are 100% sure of what we saw. a metallic object defying logic with is way of flying. it was no balloon! it was a solid (metallic craft of some unknown type).
i am not sure what the other objects where because i was still shocked from sighting of craft.

during the sighting i was overwhelmed with a feeling of total awe! i remember thinking how is it possible that such a thing can fly? i was so excited after the sighting that i called 2 friends in my lunch break right after the sighting to tell them about it. i was almost shaking.
content.summary: Sighting of a "star shaped craft at noon time out my office window. i got a very good view of this craft. it´s a mystery to myseld what this could be and how it could fly.

content.detailedDescription: Observed bright lights in western sky--just above mountain range.  with naked eye it looked as though it was 1 object and with binoculars it was likely two objects; 1 appearing bigger than another.  the lights were magnificently bright and would change sequentially displaying all colors of the rainbow.  i am going to see if our cameras caught anything but doubtful.  i drew a picture of it--diamond shaped with diamond squares displaying bright colors--it seemed to be communicating with the smaller object next to it.  it hovered for about 20 minutes then it moved south eventually disappearing.  definitely not a plane, star or planet.  we got our kids out of bed so they could observe it. so cool!!!
content.summary: Ufo with bright lights seen in western skies of co last night

content.detailedDescription:
Before i begin i want to make it clear that what i observed was so far away that it may have been a pulsating star, a planet etc. the weird thing is that i again witnessed it last night making me believe it may just be a star. unfortunately i can't see it except on clear nights.  i know it can't be a jet, as in a 747 or larger because it doesn't move in a straight line. i really wish i had a telescope so i could see it better / clearer.  i also assume that if this was something out of the ordinary or strange, i would not have been the only person to see it.  if it was something worth anyone's time i am sure nasa would have had one of its may telescope's pointed at it but you never know.



i am a 43 year old male.  i live in stratford, connecticut at 255 kenyon street. my coordinates are latitude 41.21484535145122 and longitude is -73.15099865198135. on the night of july 22nd i was out in front of my house standing in my driveway having a cigar looking up at the stars.  it was a very clear night.  at some point my eye caught something moving. it definitely had a shape to it which seemed to change as if it was turning or flipping end over end.  i have never witnessed anything like this and it was so far away i thought it was just a star playing tricks with my mind. i watched it for a little while longer then dismissed it and went inside.  

 

about 15 days later on aug 6th i went onto my back deck and sat down in a chair and looked up at the sky again. it was another beautiful clear night.  after about 15 - 20 minutes i saw what i thought was probably an airplane.  what made me suspicious was that again, it was so high in the atmosphere that i thought to myself "this can't be a plane." it was a single point of light that slowly moved across the sky. there were no blinking lights, no colored lights.  just one solid pinpoint of light that moved across the sky. i then thought that maybe it was the i.S.S. but i did not do the research to see where the i.S.S. was at that point and time. i dismissed it as a "shooting star" or asteroid because it moved so slow and in a perfectly straight line. 

 

i am not a ufo hunter. its just that these two circumstances happening so close together seemed very "weird", especially the first sighting.  there was so much more of a "form" to it.  the second sighting was just too far away to make any distinction about it even though it was moving.  i know at night the sky can play tricks with your mind so i didn't want to make a big deal about it.  i was curious to see if anyone else in the tri state area saw anything in the sky on those nights or nights around then.  i could have kicked myself in the butt for not having a telescope those two nights.  it probably could have answered a lot of questions.  i think i am going to invest in a telescope so next time, if there is a next time, i will have a better idea as to what the objects may be.

thank you,

paul depietro
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: When i was approximately 7 or 8 years old, my father, brother, uncle and i were on the rooftop of my building looking at fireworks across the city. it was then that all four of us looked slightly upwards and saw the object move from left to right in a "w" pattern (sharp 90 degree angles). the object disappeared and then reappeared and repeated the same motion another sequence  and then disappeared again (not to return). we all saw the object and commented on how fast it did what it did and that we didn't know what it was or at least what we knew what it wasn't... my uncle has since passed but my father, brother and myself still vividly remember the incident and feel that we (the us) or other countries do not have the technology to move at the speed or direction that this object moved.
content.summary: Object appeared and moved in a rapid w path 2 times

content.detailedDescription: My wife brother in law and sister in law had been to my sister in laws 60th birthday party in her daughters house we left the party at 12 30am to go home as my wife and i live in the rhondda valley approx. 15 miles from brigend where the sighting took place so we slept over in brigend that night my brother in law and i went to bed this was now 1 10am my wife who is a smoker went to have a cigarete before coming to bed out in the back garden while she was out there something caught her eye she called my sister in law to come and have a look when she seen the lights as well she came upstairs to call me and her huband i came down to look as well it was amazing there was intermitant clouds and we could see these blue and green lights through the clouds but not in the clear sky so when the light moved to my right it went invisible then when it went behind the next cloud and appeared again it done this about five or six times the time now was 1 50am at this time i was starting to get cold so i went back to bed but i cant get it out of my head.
content.summary: C   ould be seen through clouds but not in clear sky

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were on our way back from shopping in the small town of grants, nm around 9pm.  as we drove east on i-40 we observed the night time sky.  expecting to see the meteor showers, we keep our eyes open.  i notice what i believed was a planet in the western horizon.  it strobed in a way that didnt look familiar.  the objects brilliance grew then if faded out.  i thought it had gone behind a cloud but with the moon out i did not observe any clouds in the general area of the object.  then again the light intensity of the object grew again..It got very bright again, brighter than any stars in the area.  when we got home, i alerted the family and we all went out and looked.  saw nothing then all of a sudden again the orb appeared.  lower in the horizon and this time we saw jets flying toward the object.  it would fade out and grow in intensity as it descended into the horizon.  we observed it for at least 30 mins.  it was no weather balloon.  we looked through binoculars and it looked to have a diamond shape.  i have always looked up and observed objects in the sky just never have seen anything like this.  any ideas as to what i saw... military? ufo?
content.summary: Pulsating orb in desert southwest skys.

content.detailedDescription: This is the first time l have ever put in writing what me and my friend saw that night.Has keen anglers we decided with permission from our parents to go night fishing at the local fishing pond grey mist.Our parents  agreed as long has my dad was allowed to drive us there and come pick us up the next morning .Grey mist is a huge fishing pond in the middle of a refuge tip with plenty of clear sky unhindered by buildings or housing and on this night the above was virtually cloudless.At around two in the morning my friend noticed lights about a mile ahead or so from where we sat in the night sky getting closer,there seemed like there was actual balls of light falling from nearing crafts or l should say dripping.Different colours,red,yellow blue,purple,white we were perplexed,the colours were dripping like you would see plastic when on fire from the sky.Within seconds the crafts were above the pond and the colours stopped falling out of them,what we saw then horrified us l counted at least 10 objects a few were like planes with windows like a plane running horizontal butvoid of wings,grey triangular crafts and the most abundant were the orbs or disk shape things.The crafts l estimate around a 100 ft in the sky its difficult to say some looked higher the sky than others and scattered at a distance of around a quarter mile.Then one of the orb shaped objects started to move towards us,this did not resemble a craft it was more like a ball of light,at this point we started to panic and ran up the embankment after which the brightest of whites seem to engulf us and all went blank and l awoke sat next to my friend at around 8am .Obviously l had experienced a bad dream.We packed and waited for my dad to pick us up,while we were waiting my friend came out with a dialogue that knocked me to the ground he described absolutely every l had dreamt about virtually every detail.Lt was strange because l could finish what he was about to say before he finished his description and vice versa.How could we have dreamt exactly the same thing to every detail?After this frank my best friend in the world never came near me again he told people l was weird and could read peoples dreams and all that ,it scared him.L have since found that he hung himself at 22.My story is nearly the same since that night l have never been the same my personality changed from a happy go lucky kid to introspective moody loner its difficult to explain since that night ldont feel l belong here any more like my home is elsewhere.The damage was not just psychological but physical as well.That morning when l got home l felt a burning sensation at the back of my right earlobe when felt behind my ear there was  a scab that was not there the day before,after a few days there was a round dint l could and can still can today fit comfortably the end of my pinky finger in right above my upper cheek bone under my earlobe like someone put a cigar out behind there.L am now nearly 50 years old but what happened that night was no dream l can still feel the fear in my bones l felt that night.L have only told my present partner of this until now because of the obvious stigma attached to such subject matter as this.L pray and hope no one else go,s through what i have dealt with ,not being able to say anything or hopefully l can help by telling them there not on there own.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: Multiple crafts: cigar shaped with windows,disks,triangle objects in background.

content.detailedDescription:
I am 29 years old, i was doing my graduation 2004 and it was my first year in the college. i used to live in the college hostel. it was a clear night, at around 10 o'clock me and 3 other friends went to the roof top of our hostel after having dinner. i was talking on the cellphone, suddenly something very bright caught my eye, i thought it might be a shooting star but then i again looked at it and it was still there, at that moment i knew it was not a shooting star because a shooting star would have disappeared in a flash but this object was very bright, you could see its shape, it was pointed as a missile and it had a very bright tail like a rocket and the tail was as long as the object itself. it was traveling at a very high speed and at a very high altitude.

i am a pilot and i would say it was traveling approximately 20,000-25,000 feet high at around 7-8 mach. it's size was enormous, somewhere around 400-500 feet long (with the tail). it kept traveling towards south without even making any kind of noise. it started from north on the horizon and it was visible till it reached the opposite end on the horizon in the south. there was no other building anywhere near our hostel as it was in the middle of a countryside so on a clear day (or night) you had an infinite visibility. it was possible to see from horizon to horizon from a roof top. the color of the object was bright silver and the flame was the same color as well.

i asked my friends to look at it and even they didn't knew what that thing was. i was talking on the cellphone when this event started happening, the battery was about to die but as soon as that object reached right on top of us, i noticed that the battery of my cell phone was full. it was really strange for a cell phone to get charged up with in a matter of seconds.

it was visible for about 5 to 6 minutes and we all had a very good look at it. i can tell you from my experience as a pilot that it was not something from this world. i have a very keen interest in aviation and i keep myself updated with the latest technologies and developments in the field and i could that it was not something i ever heard of. we don't have that kind of technology to develop anything like this which can travel around 7 or 8 mach and not make any sound at all.

we were not able to capture any picture or video of that object to prove the story but the events of that night are imprinted in my memory. at that time camera phones were not very popular in india and i just had a basic model (nokia 3300) and none of us was expecting something like this so we didn't had any camera as well. 

i was watching tv the other day and there was a program on discovery science about the ufos, and the story they were running was about the events of january 08, 2008 in stephen ville, texas. and it occurred to me that i should too report what i witnessed in 2004. i wanted to bring this story to the light, so that you could do some research on it and might be able to provide me with some answers about that object.

i know that i cannot prove the events of that night as i don't have any proof of it, but then again how many people plan on seeing something like this? all i have is the memory of that night and whether anybody believe me or not i know that what i saw that night was something that not a lot of people can witness in their lifetime, so i consider myself very lucky.
content.summary: A very bright and missile shaped object was sighted, travelling from northern horizon to the southern horizon.

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunny afternoon with some cumulus clouds in the sky. i was at a park with kids and as i watched them playing, movement in the sky caught my attention. i looked over the treetops and saw a black object flying n, but occasionally it made a jerky movement.  there was no noise, although in the last hour i'd seen three jets heading n and had clearly heard them, but they were flying at a higher altitude than the black and metallic object.  from the side and bottom the object was black, but when it turned it shone like silver metal.  unfortunately, i spent so much time watching it and trying to decide if it was a plane or not, that i didn't think to take a photo until it turned to head e. it flew for about 10 or 20 more seconds, and i had just about decided it must be a small plane, when it abruptly turned s, accelerated, and shot in a straight line heading s.  as i stood there thinking about it, it reappeared and repeated the same movements, and once again sped off after making several abrupt movements and directional changes.  i didn't see it again after that. the whole episode lasted several minutes. on its second pass, i took two photos of the sky while watching it fly, but there is nothing in the frames.  is this possible?  i know i saw a black object flying irratically.  i don 't know if anyone else noticed it or not. the other parents and kids at the park were involved in a birthday party and were playing in the water park.
content.summary: Black and metallic object flying n then e then s, then repeating quickly, then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
August 11, 2013 - ufo sighting

i was laying out on the trampoline with my sister at about 11:00 at night. we both had blankets and were scanning the sky in hopes of seeing meteors, as tonight was suppose to be the peak of a meteor shower, i believe the persides meteor shower is what my dad called it. we could see a few stars, though it was difficult as we live rather close to the city, and smoke from a distant forest fire was obscuring some of the sky slightly. however, throughout the thirty minutes we were outside we saw three or four meteors. 

about 10 minutes after we came out, we saw something peculiar and very out of place floating across the sky in a south/south west direction. it appeared to be maybe 6 or 7 lights hovering around each other and moving in a similar pattern to molecules. even so, it's south-ward path was steady and it was silent. i passed it off as a flock of birds, not really concerned about it. the sighting lasted about 6-7 seconds. after that my sister saw a meteor. not a big k e, but a fairly obvious one, to the north-west. 

later, my step-dad, joined us on the tramp and watched for meteors with us. after a few minutes, i saw a small meteor directly overhead. it was small and not obvious, but i saw it nonetheless. after that, me and my step-dad saw an orange colored meteor to the south east. it appeared for a second, then vanished.

after this i looked up, almost toward the south west, an spotted the strange ufo again. i pointed it out to  my step-dad and sister, both spotting it immediately. again, it looked like a set of 6-7 lights bubbling about each other like molecules. they seemed to be either grey, or white with a slight orange hue. the sighting lasted about 8-9 seconds before it disappeared behind our trees.  its path was, again steady, despite the bubbly appearance of its lights, and this time it was headed north east. 

my sister, step-father, and i, conversed about it a bit before we had to head inside for the night. we all agreed that it was shaped like either a boomerang, or a v. we agreed that it looked like several lights together. 

at this point, my mom came out to tell us to come inside. my dad told her about the ufo which we had just seen, and proceeded to tell us that his friend dan had seen something similar, many years ago about this time of year. when we told my mom, she didnt seem to believe us, she seemed skeptical, despite three confirmations of the sighting.

after that, my sister and i stayed outside for ten more minutes, waiting to see more meteors, but we didn't see anything else.

i am not, by any means, claiming to have seen some "alien craft". it was simply, a ufo: an unidentified flying object. both times i saw it, it had the same appearance: several bubbly lights moving about like molecules, the lights were orange-ish or grey, moving in a steady path, and it was silent. the second time seeing it did invoke a bit of fear in me, but i am not too concerned about this sighting.

i am fairly young, and have a very creative mind. i am also very imaginative. although my step-dad and my sister saw it too, i may have been imagining things. despite my creative attributes, i am a very logic-oriented person. it may have simply been a flock of birds, illuminated slightly by the light pollution from the nearby city, it may have been some kind of craft. i am not sure
content.summary: Boomerang shaped object. saw it twice.

content.detailedDescription:
I was west of the airport (i don't believe it was an airplane), no wings and since i live on a runway approach lane i see them several times daily and this was much different in appearance.
there was a storm south of location traveling north east, i took some photos with cell phone camera a few seconds apart and the object suddenly appears.
i didn't notice it until i was showing the pics to my wife that evening, at 4:29:58 there is no trace of object, at 4:30:06 it is clearly visible but appears to be behind clouds because the object looks fuzzy. 
at first i didn't think anything of it, just found it odd that it appears out of nowhere like that when 8 seconds earlier it wasn't visible.
the object is brownish in color and cigar or rectangle shaped. i don't know if it moved or not because at the time i was looking lower in the sky at the storm in the distance. 
i don't really have any feelings on the matter, i was familiar with your organization from television and figured i would report it to people who take an interest and study things like this.
i didn't lose site of the object since i never actually saw it until i reviewed the pics several hours later.
content.summary: Taking photos of storm moving north east, took several photos seconds apart and object appeared suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light from the window, as i was watching tv late into the night tonight. i'm pretty sure the light was unrelated to the object i have been observing, however the light was very bright, and gave me weird feeling, like i should look outside. after a few minutes it finally got to me and i looked outside for a minute, then suddenly in the distance this object caught my eye, in this area there is basically nothing, my home is placed on a hill where i can see pretty much the whole town, and the interstate from my bedroom window. this object is below the clouds, because its cloudy tonight and you can see no stars or even the moon. this object is an orange red, sort of like a street light (at least in my area) except really far away, i've watched it for a long time now, it starts to dim then gets bright again, and has not moved at all during the time i have been observing it. even as i write this i still glance out the window which i have since moved my chair to and opened, so i can observe, and its still there. still pulsating and remaining stationary. there are no objects or points of light even remotely close to this object (rural area, 1.8k town population). i'm not sure that witnessing this object has given me any special feelings, other than blatant curiosity.
content.summary: Light in the sky, pulsating stationary. cloudy night, under the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to a friend's house. as i rounded the bend towards udf on 49, i noticed what seemed to be one extremely pure white light sitting stationary in the air. i sat at the red light watching to see if there would be any movement, but there was none. the proceeded to turn green and i drove towards the neighborhood. i slowed down after crossing the intersection to observe the object. as i drew closer, i realized that it was two white lights instead of one. the two lights sat fairly close to each other. the lights were attached to one side of a dark colored triangle with rounded corners sitting perfectly still, not even 300 feet above the driving range. there were 3-4 red blinking lights that were closer to the inside of the triangle, rather than on the points as most ufo sightings. i wondered to myself what kind of aircraft would be sitting so close to ground at 9 o'clock at night? it was so close, i could see some texture on the bottom of it (i.E. indentations and protrusions). i had a cd playing, but not loudly, so if it was as loud as an airplane, i would have heard it. i heard nothing. i tried to watch it still as i turned into the neighborhood, only to look away for literally one second to look into my rearview mirror and it was gone. for some reason, i did not think to pull out my phone and record it or take a picture. i would not have anyway because it was frightening seeing something that you do not recognize. i told myself that it was probably just an airplane and i would tell my parents about it when i got back home. i mentioned it to my friend once i reached his house and he jokingly but not jokingly said it was probably a ufo. honestly, while i looked at it, i was more or less in awe, curious and confused. but afterwards, i began to get nervous as i did not want to believe that it was anything besides an airplane as i described it to my family and they decidedly told me that it indeed was not an airplane.
content.summary: A black triangle with two fluorescent lights on one side and 3-4 red blinking lights.
